---
title: "Water Depletion and WaterGap3 Basins"
format: html
editor: visual
---

**Source**: [Water Depletion and WaterGap3 Basins - EarthStat](http://www.earthstat.org/water-depletion-watergap3-basins/)

**Spatial Reference:** GCS_WGS_1984

**Annual water depletion categories**

1= \<5%\
2= 5-25%\
5= Dry-Year\
6= Seasonal\
7= 75-100%\
8= \>100%

```{r}
load(here('data', 'grappe_gps.RData'))

water_depletion <- terra::rast(here('data_raw', 'leon_data', 'rasters', 'WaterDepletionCat_WG3.tiff'))

# terra::crs(water_depletion)

water_depletion_by_grappe <- water_depletion %>% 
  exactextractr::exact_extract(grappe_buffer) %>% 
  rbindlist(idcol = "id") %>% 
  group_by(id) %>% 
    summarize(water_depletion = sum(value * coverage_fraction) / sum(coverage_fraction))

# merge 
water_depletion <- grappe_sf |> 
  rowid_to_column(var = "id") |> 
  left_join(water_depletion_by_grappe, by = "id")

save(water_depletion, file = here('data', 'water_depletion.RData'))
  
```
